sentences.en: He is always considerate to old people.
sentences.cn: 他对老人一向体贴入微.

sentences.en: He is no more considerate of others than his brother is.
sentences.cn: 他不体谅别人,就跟他弟弟一样.

sentences.en: He was always kind and considerate.
sentences.cn: 他总是很善良，为别人着想。

sentences.en: I thanked her for her considerate choice for me.
sentences.cn: 我感谢她为我作了周到的选择.

sentences.en: I think he's the most charming, most considerate man I've ever known.
sentences.cn: 我觉得他是我所认识的最有魅力、最体贴的男士。

sentences.en: It stands to reason that if you are considerate and friendly to people you will get a lot more back.
sentences.cn: 显然，如果你通情达理，对人友善，那么你肯定会获得更多回报。

sentences.en: It was very considerate of you to send me a postcard.
sentences.cn: 你想得真周到,寄给我明信片.

sentences.en: She is always polite and considerate towards her employees.
sentences.cn: 她对待雇员总是客客气气，关心体谅。

sentences.en: That considerate lady made the beverage, and handed it to Mr. Bounderby.
sentences.cn: 那位体贴入微的贵妇人把那种饮料做好, 亲手端来给庞得贝先生.

sentences.en: The ladies were considerate enough not to ask when this would be.
sentences.cn: 她们很能体谅男人们的难处,也就不再刨根问底追问究竟何时结束了.

sentences.en: The patient has the right to considerate and respectful care.
sentences.cn: 病人有权得到周到而礼貌的照顾。

sentences.en: This insecurity is infuriating and the antithesis of considerate human behavior.
sentences.cn: 这种不安全感简直令人生气,它完全违背了人类的体贴.

sentences.en: We have all wished for men who are more considerate.
sentences.cn: 我们都曾祈求能找到更加体贴的男人。

sentences.en: We should all endeavor to be more considerate of others.
sentences.cn: 我们都应该努力多为别人着想.

sentences.en: We think that he is the most considerate person we have ever met.
sentences.cn: 我们认为他在我们碰到的人中间是最能体谅人的.

sentences.en: Wolf Larsen was quite considerate, the sailors helped me.
sentences.cn: 海狼赖生非常体谅我, 水手们都帮助我.

sentences.en: You could have been more considerate.

trans.tran_en: always thinking of what other people need or want and being careful not to upset them
